messages.message: I've been trying to get my sandbox up for a while but it remains stuck on the customize home step. Are there some guaranteed steps to get it running properly? https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/udit-dev?cw=dev
I can't see the logs for the hung step anymore (haven't seen that before :thonk:), would you mind if I rebooted your sandbox so I can look for errors?
oh it seems up, what did you do?

dope dope, just got it back up -- I suspended your sandbox then ran this from my laptop command line
```cs sandbox update udit-dev -D 'dev/env[WEBAPP_LITE_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[WEBAPP_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[APPS_SERVER_LITE_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[APPS_SERVER_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[API_SERVER_LITE_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[API_SERVER_ENABLED]=0' -D 'dev/env[WEBPACK_ENABLED]=0'```
which disables any service daemons. I'm not sure what was failing to complete since we don't have the logs, but I'm assuming it's because of something failing to build
for sure :slightly_smiling_face: lmk if you have any trouble bringing your daemons back up!
